# CREATE2

A create2 salt generator that gets a specific contract address.

Support eoa generat now!

## compile

```bash
go bulid main.go
```

## usage

```bash
./main -a <address> -i <init byte code> -p <prefix> -s <suffix> -n 100000
```

address: Factory contract's address

init byte code: contract's init code

prefix: prefix for generating address

suffix: suffix for generating address

number: goroutine number

If you want to get eoa, just use p and s.

## example

### contract address

1. Changing the Test contract.
2. Deploy Factory contract Deployer, this code is in deployer.sol.
3. Get init byte code by Deployer contract.
4. Using ./main to get salt

```bash
% ./main -a 0x26b989b9525Bb775C8DEDf70FeE40C36B397CE67 -i  -p 123 -s abc -n 100000
[+] Start!
5229343943791775475
0x123Bc50381F5F6a0D4931C614FE5b38978ed5abc
```

5. call deploy function in Deployer contract.


### Eoa

```shell
./main -p 00 -s 00 -n 100000
[+] Start!
0x004c34650E5E8BdC92B53f0af9E11C68bD171600
0x04c20981e5e6c8fcdc51c70f7d369ca22ef5a0ba096c05c3c6cf9f22b71b8896
```
